name: Last Knight: The curse of Athore
name_original: Last Knight: The curse of Athore
description:
This is my first game as indie dev!

Last Knight: The curse of Athore is a catch-game with two game modes, in one of them you must get points and avoid the bombs, while in the other, you must get energy to attack the enemy and dodge their attacks!

You will unlock different helms and fragments of story when you finish each one of the enemies!

I hope you enjoy it, any feedback is appreciated!
